impact_weight: The reduction of GHG emissions can reinforce waste reduction efforts by promoting sustainable practices and reducing energy consumption, which in turn can decrease municipal waste generation.
Improving air quality can enable the implementation of circular economy practices in municipal waste management by reducing the environmental impacts of waste treatment and promoting recycling.
The improvement of water quality can reinforce waste reduction efforts in plastic and packaging by reducing marine litter and promoting sustainable consumption patterns.

impact_subtheme: Circularity/Recycling - Critical Raw Materials - Batteries Recycling
impact_weight: The improvement of soil health can enable the recycling of critical raw materials, such as those used in batteries, by promoting sustainable agricultural practices and reducing waste generation.

The reduction of noise pollution can constrain the development of net-zero technologies, such as wind turbines, which can generate noise pollution, highlighting the need for careful planning and implementation.
The improvement of sanitation can reinforce waste reduction efforts in food waste by promoting sustainable consumption patterns and reducing food waste generation.

The improvement of water quality can enable the implementation of circular economy practices in municipal waste management by reducing the environmental impacts of waste treatment and promoting recycling.

The improvement of soil health can counteract the extraction and import of critical raw materials, which can have negative environmental impacts on soil health, highlighting the need for sustainable practices.
